update dc_bill_info
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CUSTOMER_NO = #{record.customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGH_PRODUCT_TYPE = #{record.highProductType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_SOURCE = #{record.billSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVERDUE_DAYS = #{record.overdueDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IN_COLLECTION_REASON = #{record.inCollectionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_PRICE = #{record.productPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOST_CONTACT_TIMES = #{record.lostContactTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MINIMUM_PAYMENT = #{record.minimumPayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILL_DAY = #{record.billDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REPAY_DAY = #{record.repayDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEAST_CALL_RESULT = #{record.leastCallResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEST_COLLECTION_RESULT = #{record.bestCollectionResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURR_PROMISE_REPAY = #{record.currPromiseRepay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PROMISE_REPAY_DAY = #{record.isPromiseRepayDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HISTORY_LEAST_CALL_RESULT = #{record.historyLeastCallResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HISTORY_BEST_COLLECTION_RESULT = #{record.historyBestCollectionResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLECTION_STATUS = #{record.collectionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_TYPE = #{record.outType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_HAND_TYPE = #{record.outHandType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_STATUS = #{record.outStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPAY_CUSTOMER = #{record.repayCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLECTION_NUM = #{record.collectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PHONE_NUM = #{record.phoneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JUSTICE_NUM = #{record.justiceNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VISIT_NUM = #{record.visitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_NUM = #{record.smsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUSTOM_TYPE = #{record.customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_FIRST_OVERDUE = #{record.isFirstOverdue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVERDUE_STAGE = #{record.overdueStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENERAL_CREDIT_USE_RATE = #{record.generalCreditUseRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GENERAL_CREDIT = #{record.generalCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_DEBT = #{record.totalDebt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_MONEY = #{record.overdueMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

HISTORY_HIGH_OVERDUE_STAGE = #{record.historyHighOverdueStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remain_principal_amt = #{record.remainPrincipalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
